Hack n Slash.Description: When you attack an enemy in melee, roll+Str.

Results.10+: On a 10+, you deal your damage to the enemy and avoid their attack. At your option, you may choose to do +1d6 damage but expose yourself to the enemy’s attack.
Results.7-9: On a 7–9, you deal your damage to the enemy and the enemy makes an attack against you.

Volley.Description: When you take aim and shoot at an enemy at range, roll+Dex.

Results.10+: On a 10+, you have a clear shot—deal your damage.
7-9: On a 7–9, choose one (whichever you choose you deal your damage):
You have to move to get the shot placing you in danger as described by the GM
You have to take what you can get: -1d6 damage
You have to take several shots, reducing your ammo by one

Defend.Description: When you stand in defense of a person, item, or location under attack, roll+Con.

Hold: Redirect an attack from the thing you defend to yourself
Halve the attack’s effect or damage
Open up the attacker to an ally giving that ally +1 forward against the attacker
Deal damage to the attacker equal to your level

Description: When you act despite an imminent threat or suffer a calamity, say how you deal with it and roll. If you do it
by getting out of the way or acting fast, +Dex

Results.10+: On a 10+, you do what you set out to, the threat doesn’t come to bear.
Results.7-9: On a 7-9, you stumble, hesitate, or flinch: the GM will offer you a worse outcome, hard bargain, or ugly choice.
Results.Extra: The GM might ask you "How do you know this?" Tell them the truth, now.

Spout Lore.Description: When you consult your accumulated knowledge about something, roll+Int.

Results.10+: On a 10+, the GM will tell you something interesting and useful about the subject relevant to your situation.
Results.7-9: On a 7–9, the GM will only tell you something interesting—it’s on you to make it useful.
Results.6-: On a miss the GM’s move will often involve the time you take thinking. Maybe you miss that goblin moving around behind you, or the tripwire across the hallway. It’s also a great chance to reveal an unwelcome truth.

Parley.Description: When you have leverage on a GM Character and manipulate them, roll+Cha. Leverage is something they need or want.

Results.10+: On a 10+, they do what you ask if you first promise what they ask of you.
Results.7-9: On a 7–9, they will do what you ask, but need some concrete assurance of your promise, right now.

Discern Realities.Description: When you closely study a situation or person, roll+Wis.

Results.10+: On a 10+, ask the GM 3 questions from the list below.
Extra: Either way, take 1 forward when acting on the answers
What should I be on the lookout for?
What here is useful or valuable to me?
What here is not what it appears to be?
